feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: AI description - Backend for adding translation objects to EventType model by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17657
  • fix: outdated/broken og preview image for org events by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17812
  • chore: Add check to skip DB migrations as part of build by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17827
  • fix: UI issue in Phone Input dropdown by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17837
  • fix: Salesforce owner check, handle no contact email by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17834
  • chore: settings/organizations - remove pages router and use app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16774
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17842
  • fix: oauth client users controller permissions by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17822
  • chore: make throttler logs verbose by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17845
  • chore: use app router for settings/platform/members page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17849
  • fix: send attendee email with event updates of reassignment by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17836
  • fix: use tags icon for /settings/organizations/attributes page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17841
  • chore: exclude emails form field refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17824
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17854
  • fix: round robin host reschedule error by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17855
  • fix: unable to remove banner by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17857
  • feat: Salesforce - pass company booking response to the Lead field by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17860
  • fix: provide fixed widths for DataTable columns by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17853

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.11...v4.7.12

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Routing form report filters by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17865
  • chore: add Free to platform plan guard by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17862
  • fix: (Hotfix)any group of rules in routing by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17869
  • fix: move organization members list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17531
  • fix: load more rows if the existing ones do not fill the space by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17874
  • chore: make i18n.json the single source of truth by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17876
  • fix: v2 return booking with split name attendee by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17877
  • refactor: v2 return host username by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17880
  • fix: Remove double encoding for OG image URLs by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17872
  • feat: add tooltip to button for better UX by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17881
  • feat: hide the update button in case of no permission by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17883
  • chore: temporarily remove push notifications button until we have proper support by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17887

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.12...v4.7.13

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Exclude locked users by default by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17889
  • refactor: v2 validate booking fields by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17878
  • fix: revert bg color for pinned column at data table by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17892
  • fix: remove from host when removed from org by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17893
  • fix: getAttributeRoutingConfig find the route based on the chosenRouteId by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17867
  • feat: Salesforce - send routing form responses to Salesforce by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17890
  • fix: locked users admin list and bypass query by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17902

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.13...v4.7.14

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: #16028 Org Settings - SEOIndexing,Disable Org Url by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16075
  • fix: bulk attribute assignment by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17896
  • build: Reduce bundle size from unnecessary bundeling react/jsx-runtime in embed-react package by @KlotzJesse in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17790
  • fix: Added proper updates/interactivity on the "Getting started" app integâ€¦ by @itsalam in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17903
  • fix : Issue on docs by @askadityapandey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17895
  • feat: show attributes in profile by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17920
  • fix: Broken integration test due to month change by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17949
  • feat: no show guests on insights by @VK-RED in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17919
  • fix: UI regression related to DataTable by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17943
  • fix: Meeting URL does not save when changing the location to Gmeet or any static app by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17840
  • fix: refactor OG link builder by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17897
  • chore: Extract some refactor work from util.ts to improve error handling by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17912
  • fix: navigation items weird behavior by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17929
  • fix: /members improvements by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17911
  • fix: host entry not created when user added to team in org by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17927
  • feat: routing form table merge columns by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17938
  • fix: Display option label in the routing form response email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17898
  • feat: Show add to calendar section for customers after booking an event by @coder-adnan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17761
  • fix: ai translations description for atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17875
  • chore: fixed colored event margin by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17932
  • fix: fix date comparison for OOO by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17756
  • fix: Date Range Picker behavior by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17914
  • chore: Reduce org banner height on mobile booker by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17954

New Contributors

  • @KlotzJesse made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17790
  • @coder-adnan made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17761

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.14...v4.7.15

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: brand colors set by user not respected in embed by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17399
  • test: fix organisation settings e2e by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17957
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17952
  • fix: Revert "merge columns (#17938)" by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17960
  • feat: return participants by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17950
  • fix: change case for column size vars by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17961
  • feat: Salesforce - add option to ignore guests by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17956
  • fix: remove platform and console submodule by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17939
  • fix: build failure for v4.7.15 by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17968
  • chore: safeMarkdown by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17972
  • fix: org bio by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17971
  • chore: use markdownToSafeHTML in EventMeta by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17975
  • docs: v2 rolling window and authentication by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17825
  • fix: Remove user from managed event type when removing from org by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17369
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17965
  • fix: handling of defaultLabel by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17976

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.15...v4.7.16
